title: The Quay Brothers - In Absentia (2000).avi
description:
The Quay Brothers - In Absentia

The story of E.H., a woman in an asylum writing letters to her dead husband, containing just this one sentence: "Herzensschatzeli komm" (sweetheart come)
a quite obscure stop-motion film by the Quay Brothers showing visions of an absent mind longing for the loved one.

I didn't find this piece in other torrents of Quay brothers collection so i felt the urge to add it.
The quality is not of a very high standard, please don't complain about that.
if you have a better version, shame on you for not yet uploading it.

Video: DivX; 320x240; 29 fps;
Audio: Lame mp3; 96 kbps

Please help me seed a little.
